channel.title: Quick Forums Help
channel.description:
Well I've been pretty unsatisfied with the current forum host that I am running off of which is SMFNEW. Their servers are always down and I'm constantly encountering issues with them. Does anyone know a good website creater/hoster aside from the following:
http://smfnew.com http://smfforfree.com http://webs.com http://forummotion.com
Thanks,
Resent

item.title: Quick Forums Help
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

Chassy, can you give me a link for phpBB and a link for x10 hosting and where to get 000webhost from?

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Forums Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You can buy a VPS and put your forums on there.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Forums Help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Personally I like the layout of SMF or phpBB for forum software, and then for hosting I use x10 hosting (it’s free, but they will suspend your account if you provide a download to the client via the forum, but you can have any information regarding the server on it). You can use 000webhost as a free webhost as well, or buy a paid domain. Your choice.

There are TONS of free forum software and webhosts out there that are appealing.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Forums Help
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

Just use forummotion and add the points per post…

Then you can add a " point exchange " and give items for a certain amount of points.

Ex:

Point store:
D claws 5000 PTS
Ags 4200 PTS
Partyhat 6500 PTS

I’f I have 10000 points and I wanna buy a partyhat I’d make a topic stating " I want phat for 6000 points "

You then receive in game phat and 6000 point reduction from forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Forums Help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Resent:

I’ve heard that Vbulletin is one of the best forum versions around, but is there somewhere where I can get the forum software for free?

You can use a nulled version of vBulletin, but would get the website reported and what not if one found out about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Forums Help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Resent:

I’ve heard that Vbulletin is one of the best forum versions around, but is there somewhere where I can get the forum software for free?

Go get a .com hoster. Now go find a cool looking website that you like. Rip the HTML code and paste it onto your site. Now your site is sexy, and you did little to no work at all!

I’m kidding. Go buy a vbulletin.

Read full topic
